TopicTitle: Hotkey for navball in map mode

Articles.Content:
I think it's a fairly common glitch that you aren't able to click on the wee arrow to bring up the Navball in map mode, which is quite annoying.

Can I request a hotkey to do it for us, so we don't have to deal with the bug?

It never happened to me that I wouldn't be able to click on that arrow. And besides, according to Wiki:

. (numpad del) Toggle navball

Not that I ever needed to use that key.

... and I have just verified that it works in Map mode. So I think it's a RTFM issue.
